title: Carbon Black Cloud - Auth Events
description: This provides authentication activity overview and events across users, devices, and logon types to monitor access.

definition.content:
This dashboard offers detailed visibility into authentication activity across endpoints, including successful and failed logins, account lockouts, and impersonation attempts. It helps security teams monitor user behavior, detect suspicious login patterns, and investigate authentication anomalies by device, user, and logon type.

For more information, see the [Carbon Black Cloud Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/carbon_black_cloud/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
